```{r}
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(readr)

    ```

```{r}
cleaner_names <-
    here("raw_data/decathlon.rds") %>% 
    read_rds() %>% 
    clean_names()
    
```

```{r}
clean_data <-
    cleaner_names %>% 
    rownames_to_column(var = "competitor") %>% 
    pivot_longer(x100m:x1500m, names_to = "event", values_to = "event_points") %>%
    rename("ranking" = rank, "overall_competition_points" = "points") %>% 
    view()
```



```{r}
write_rds(clean_data, "clean_data/clean_data.rds")
```
